name.description: Name of publisher endpoint (e.g. SMART Clinic, Boston)

organization.description: Name of organization publishing information (e.g. SMART Health)

synthetic.description: Whether or not the endpoint is hosting synthetic data instead of production data

baseURL.description: Base URL where clients can find the publish manifest and NDJSON files (should not include `$bulk-publish`)

contacts.description: At least one point of contact for addressing questions or issues with the endpoint

headers.description: An optional list of header key/values that must be included in requests

params.description: An optional list of query parameter key/values that must be included in requests
